# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and benefits, we believe it's worth every penny of its $80 value. Considering its exceptional quality and the satisfaction it promises, I kindly propose to sell it to you for $75. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a valuable item at a discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
